headline: Blackstone Shares Rise After Strong Inflows, Acquisitions
summary: After growing its portfolio with recent acquisitions, shares of investment manager Blackstone Inc. (BX) are up.

headline: India's Aster DM to merge with Blackstone-backed Quality Care
summary: India's Aster DM Healthcare will merge with Blackstone-backed hospitals operator Quality Care India, the companies said on Friday, bringing Aster closer to its larger rivals Apollo Hospitals and...
